attributes.action: Vaccines only to be used as advised by pharmaceutical agency who developed them.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure efficient use of government funds and protection against Covid 19
attributes.background: Follow guidance of world health organisation & medical council regarding vaccine use.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
